verses.verse: And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> his eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and looked, <S%H7200><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> Esau <S%H6215><s%> came, <S%H935><s%> and with <S%H5973><s%> him four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> men. <S%H376><s%> And he divided <S%H2673><s%> <S%H853><s%> the children <S%H3206><s%> unto <S%H5921><s%> Leah, <S%H3812><s%> and unto <S%H5921><s%> Rachel, <S%H7354><s%> and unto <S%H5921><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> handmaids. <S%H8198><s%>

And he put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H853><s%> the handmaids <S%H8198><s%> and their children <S%H3206><s%> foremost, <S%H7223><s%> and Leah <S%H3812><s%> and her children <S%H3206><s%> after, <S%H314><s%> and Rachel <S%H7354><s%> and Joseph <S%H3130><s%> hindmost. <S%H314><s%>

And he <S%H1931><s%> passed over <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them, and bowed himself <S%H7812><s%> to the ground <S%H776><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> times, <S%H6471><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> he came near <S%H5066><s%> to <S%H5704><s%> his brother. <S%H251><s%>

And Esau <S%H6215><s%> ran <S%H7323><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> him, and embraced <S%H2263><s%> him, and fell <S%H5307><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> his neck, <S%H6677><s%> and kissed <S%H5401><s%> him: and they wept. <S%H1058><s%>

And he lifted up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> his eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the women <S%H802><s%> and the children; <S%H3206><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Who <S%H4310><s%> are those <S%H428><s%> with thee? And he said, <S%H559><s%> The children <S%H3206><s%> which <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%> hath graciously given <S%H2603><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy servant. <S%H5650><s%>
Then the handmaidens <S%H8198><s%> came near, <S%H5066><s%> they <S%H2007><s%> and their children, <S%H3206><s%> and they bowed themselves. <S%H7812><s%>

And Leah <S%H3812><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> with her children <S%H3206><s%> came near, <S%H5066><s%> and bowed themselves: <S%H7812><s%> and after <S%H310><s%> came Joseph near <S%H5066><s%> <S%H3130><s%> and Rachel, <S%H7354><s%> and they bowed themselves. <S%H7812><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4310><s%> meanest thou by all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> drove <S%H4264><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I met? <S%H6298><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> These are to find <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of my lord. <S%H113><s%>
And Esau <S%H6215><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> I have <S%H3426><s%> enough, <S%H7227><s%> my brother; <S%H251><s%> keep <S%H1961><s%> that <S%H834><s%> thou hast unto thyself.

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Nay, <S%H408><s%> I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> if <S%H518><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> I have found <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in thy sight, <S%H5869><s%> then receive <S%H3947><s%> my present <S%H4503><s%> at my hand: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> I have seen <S%H7200><s%> thy face, <S%H6440><s%> as though I had seen <S%H7200><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> and thou wast pleased <S%H7521><s%> with me.

Take, <S%H3947><s%> I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> <S%H853><s%> my blessing <S%H1293><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is brought <S%H935><s%> to thee; because <S%H3588><s%> God <S%H430><s%> hath dealt graciously <S%H2603><s%> with me, and because <S%H3588><s%> I have <S%H3426><s%> enough. <S%H3605><s%> And he urged <S%H6484><s%> him, and he took <S%H3947><s%> it.
And he said, <S%H559><s%> Let us take our journey, <S%H5265><s%> and let us go, <S%H1980><s%> and I will go <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> thee.

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, My lord <S%H113><s%> knoweth <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> the children <S%H3206><s%> are tender, <S%H7390><s%> and the flocks <S%H6629><s%> and herds <S%H1241><s%> with young <S%H5763><s%> are with <S%H5921><s%> me: and if men should overdrive <S%H1849><s%> them one <S%H259><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the flock <S%H6629><s%> will die. <S%H4191><s%>

Let my lord, <S%H113><s%> I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> pass over <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> his servant: <S%H5650><s%> and I <S%H589><s%> will lead on <S%H5095><s%> softly, <S%H328><s%> according as <S%H7272><s%> the cattle <S%H4399><s%> that <S%H834><s%> goeth before <S%H6440><s%> me and the children <S%H3206><s%> be able to endure, <S%H7272><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> I come <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> my lord <S%H113><s%> unto Seir. <S%H8165><s%>

And Esau <S%H6215><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Let me now <S%H4994><s%> leave <S%H3322><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> thee some of <S%H4480><s%> the folk <S%H5971><s%> that <S%H834><s%> are with <S%H854><s%> me. And he said, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> needeth it? <S%H2088><s%> let me find <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of my lord. <S%H113><s%>
So Esau <S%H6215><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> on his way <S%H1870><s%> unto Seir. <S%H8165><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> journeyed <S%H5265><s%> to Succoth, <S%H5523><s%> and built <S%H1129><s%> him a house, <S%H1004><s%> and made <S%H6213><s%> booths <S%H5521><s%> for his cattle: <S%H4735><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the place <S%H4725><s%> is called <S%H7121><s%> Succoth. <S%H5523><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Shalem, <S%H8003><s%> a city <S%H5892><s%> of Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> when he came <S%H935><s%> from Padan-aram; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6307><s%> and pitched his tent <S%H2583><s%> <S%H853><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the city. <S%H5892><s%>

And he bought <S%H7069><s%> <S%H853><s%> a parcel <S%H2513><s%> of a field, <S%H7704><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> he had spread <S%H5186><s%> his tent, <S%H168><s%> at the hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Hamor, <S%H2544><s%> Shechem's <S%H7928><s%> father, <S%H1><s%> for a hundred <S%H3967><s%> pieces of money. <S%H7192><s%>
And he erected <S%H5324><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> an altar, <S%H4196><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> it El-elohe-Israel. <S%H415><s%>
